DOC.brief_summary: the purpose of this study is to compare the oesophageal depression induced by bilateral phrenic nerve stimulation during swallowing in patients with neurological laryngeal aspiration
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Phrenic Nerve Stimulation During Swallowing : Experimental Model of Aspiration
DOC.criteria: stroke with aspiration obstructive rhinitis bronchial obstruction pace maker phrenic nerve paralysis
